description: Simple to use, fits our family needs. I am syncing between two Ubuntus and Androids, apk available from developer. You can set up your own sync, but we are using the sync service from the developer for $29/year. There is no need to sync, if one is using it only with a single device.
For no reason, when hovering "Add budget" button, vertical and horizontal scrollbars appears which shift the content of the window. Detestable.
